content: स्थूल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>compar.</ab> स्थवीयस्, <ab>superl.</ab> स्थविष्ठ) {@--1@} Large, great, big, bulky, huge; बहुस्पृशापि स्थूलेन स्थीयते बहिरश्मवत् <ls>Śi. 2. 78</ls> (where it has sense 6 also); स्थूलहस्तावलेपान् <ls>Me. 14</ls>, <ls n="Me.">106</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Fat, corpulent, stout. {@--3@} Strong, powerful; स्थूलं स्थूलं श्वसिति <ls>K.</ls> ‘breathes hard’. {@--4@} Thick, clumsy. {@--5@} Gross, coarse, rough (<ab>fig.</ab> also); as in स्थूलमानं <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--6@} Foolish, doltish, silly, ignorant. {@--7@} Stolid, dull, thick-headed. {@--8@} Not exact. --लः The jack tree. --ला Large cardamoms. --लं {@--1@} A heap, quantity. {@--2@} A tent. {@--3@} The summit of a mountain (कूट).
